title: Drama

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose any role, then choose a player, including yourself. The chosen player is framed as the chosen role tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn the chosen player's real faction.
- Psychopathic players see past the frame.
- If the player is attacked tonight, the frame won't work.
- You can't frame yourself twice in a row.
- While you control The Psychopath, if a Psychopathic member is dead, you can choose to Premeditate instead of performing your night action. The next day, if a good player is hanged, you may choose two players to immediately deal a basic attack to before the day ends.
Kill Note Addition:
*"You can't take off my mask."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.
